Research Log: Period 3 May What miserable weather! Why is it still so cold? It's been a month since I left those disgusting Dwarves. The unbelievable hardship I've seen since then has been devastating. I made my way to a gigantic, ancient Research Lab. Thousands of dead Golems strewn about. I managed to squeeze through a little crack in the east wall of the building. At least it blocks the wind... Turn the page
